item.title: Improve data.table readability with pipes
item.description: Package data.table is sometimes criticized for its lower readability than its competitor dplyr. As a data.table user, I had the same feeling at the early days of using it. I love the concise syntax, which takes care a lot of tasks simply with dt[i, j, by]. You can put many codes at the j section. You can even chain [i, j, by] together and make train-like code dt[...][...].... I enjoyed loading a lot of code in one big train dt[.
